title: Non-aural set, C maj piano - mm 30-31 cadence

content.question: The cadence at measures 30-31 is a

choices.label: perfect authentic cadence in the tonic
perfect authentic cadence in the dominant

content.answer: perfect authentic cadence in the dominant
